artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Designer: Anthony Ballatore; Mill: Winston Prints; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Diamond patterns in broken Vert. Lines with targets & leaves. Rpt. 35" Royale cloth. Drk orange designs on olive green grometrics. Brown bkg. 35" vert. Rpt. Paprika
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Anthony Ballatore%2C Larsen Design Studio
text: The colors, textures, materials, and techniques of urban North African fabrics often reflect the influence of European sources and provide a dramatic contrast to the textiles produced in Sub-Saharan regions. Based on two of the motifs from Tropic of Capricorn, Fez effectively conveys the essence of the luxurious lampas weave fabrics that are prized in urban Moroccan culture.
title: Fez
